span.span: Copies the contents of the read-only memory region into a destination memory region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`source` 和`destination`, 此方法的行为就像原始值位于临时位置, 然后覆盖目标。If `source` and `destination`, this method behaves as if the original values are in a temporary location before the destination is overwritten.

span.span: is smaller than the source memory region.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Buffers.MemoryHandle Pin() cil managed

summary.span: 为内存创建句柄。

span.span: Creates a handle for the memory.
A handle for the memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 垃圾回收器不会移动内存, 直到释放返回的, 从而实现并使用内存的地址。The garbage collector will not move the memory until the returned is disposed, enabling taking and using the memory's address.

exception.span: 具有非基元（非直接复制到本机结构中的）成员的实例不能被固定。

span.span: An instance with nonprimitive (non-blittable) members cannot be pinned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 将此内存区域中的内容复制到新数组中。

span.span: Copies the contents from the memory region into a new array.
An array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ToArray`在堆上分配, 因此通常应避免这样做。`ToArray` allocates on the heap and so should generally be avoided. 但是, 有时需要根据数组中所编写的 Api 来弥补缺口。However, it is sometimes necessary to bridge the gap with APIs written in terms of arrays.

span.span: Tries to copy the contents of the readonly-only memory into the destination and returns a value that indicates whether the copy operation succeeded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果源和目标重叠, 则此方法的行为就像原始值位于临时位置, 然后覆盖目标。If the source and destination overlap, this method behaves as if the original values are in a temporary location before the destination is overwritten.
